name: parsimmon
description: A monadic LL(infinity) parser combinator library
author: Jeanine Adkisson <jneen at jneen dot net>

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.test:mocha: mocha -i src --ui tdd --reporter dot test/setup.js test/core/*.test.js test/laws/*.test.js
scripts.watch:test: mocha --ui tdd --reporter min --watch test/setup.js test/core/*.test.js test/laws/*.test.js
